DATA:
You know it, kid! I'm the dude with the bike.

But it's in the shop, so I went for a hike!

Oh wow, you're rhyming and even wearing a
'RIDE SAFE AND LOVE IT' shirt!
That's awesome.

My stomach is asking me for some good food!

Maybe you'd like to help me change my mood?

Oh, yes! Sorry.
Your bike is in the shop and your hungry. Got it.
...
Wait, I don't even know where we are!

I'll tell you with a beat,

Right across this street, you'll find the Kitchen
Now whip up something good to eat!

Make me something healthy to please my palate.

The 1950s wealthy jelly; the perfect salad.

To help you out, take this recipe.

I'm sure when you are cooking,
it will be a necessity!

You just keep recipes on you...
And I still don't know where we are!
